00026 #include <string>
00027 #include <sstream>
00028 #include "AResults.h"
00029 #include "Vector3.h"
00030 #include "Eigensystem3.h"
00031 
00032 AResults::AResults(){
00033 
00034 }
00035 
00036 AResults::AResults(unsigned npart, unsigned nvpart, float Xc, float Yc, float Zc,
00037            float VXc, float VYc, float VZc,
00038            float Mvir, float Rvir,
00039            float Vmax, float Rmax,
00040            float sigV, float lambda, float Jx, float Jy, float Jz,
00041            float a, float Eax, float Eay, float Eaz,
00042            float b, float Ebx, float Eby, float Ebz,
00043            float c, float Ecx, float Ecy, float Ecz,
00044            float ovdens, float Redge,
00045            int nbins,
00046            float Ekin, float Epot,
00047            float mbp_offset, float com_offset,
00048            float r2, float lambdaE){
00049   npart_ = npart;  nvpart_ = nvpart;
00050   xcm_ = Vector3(Xc, Yc, Zc);
00051   vcm_ = Vector3(VXc, VYc, VZc);
00052   Mvir_ = Mvir;  Rvir_ = Rvir;
00053   Vmax_ = Vmax;  Rmax_ = Rmax;
00054   sigV_ = sigV;
00055   lambda_ = lambda;
00056   J_ = Vector3(Jx, Jy, Jz);
00057   std::vector<real> Eval;
00058   Eval.push_back(a); Eval.push_back(b); Eval.push_back(c);
00059   std::vector<Vector3> Evec;
00060   Evec.push_back(Vector3(Eax,Eay,Eaz));
00061   Evec.push_back(Vector3(Ebx,Eby,Ebz));
00062   Evec.push_back(Vector3(Ecx,Ecy,Ecz));
00063   E_ = Eigensystem3(Eval, Evec);
00064 
00065   ovdens_ = ovdens;
00066   Redge_ = Redge;
00067   nbins_ = nbins;
00068   Ekin_ = Ekin;  Epot_ = Epot;
00069   mbp_offset_ = mbp_offset;
00070   com_offset_ = com_offset;
00071   r2_ = r2;
00072   lambdaE_ = lambdaE;
00073 }
00074 
00075 AResults::~AResults(){
00076 
00077 }
00078 
00079 std::string
00080 AResults::toString(){
00081   std::ostringstream os;
00082   os << npart_ << " ";
00083   os << nvpart_ << " ";
00084   os << Mvir_ << " ";
00085   os << Rvir_ << " ";
00086   os << xcm_.toString() << " ";
00087   os << vcm_.toString() << " ";
00088   os << lambda_ << " ";
00089   os << sigV_ << " ";
00090   os << J_.toString() << " ";
00091   os << E_.toString() << " ";
00092   return os.str();
00093 }
